name: Decasoft
description:
Decasoft, a computer engineering services company based in Paris (headquarters) and Toulouse, has been offering its expertise to clients since 2004.
Whether it be development or integration or maintenance (MOE, AMOA, consulting), Decasoft can provide services in nearly every industry including services, banking, insurance, telecommunications, distribution, and industry.
Decasoft specializes in new technologies including JAVA or J2EE, PHP, .NET, and mobile. Our services are organized around authority and flat rate modes.
